channel.title: Zibez Online Adventure v2
channel.description:
[i][b]Welcome to Zibez The Massive Multi-Player Online adventure game by Creator Zibez. Zibez Is a 3D online campatible 317 server coded to the limit with up to 15 quests. I Created Zibez in Edgeville Village as i thought its just a great partin fun and its a nice little area for a RSPS[/b][/i].
[b]Thanks guys more votes = more players and fun![/b]
[b]Thanks guys more support = more players and fun![/b]
[b]How to make money[/b]
Walk east from Edge bank and start thieving on stalls to gain decent cash. Or you can talk to rommik and start crafting and making amulets. Also train herblore by talking to siegfried and sell youre pots and stuff,also woodcut all over Zibez and sell your logs either to general or players.
[b][i]Siegfried Herblore shop[/i][/b] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/156fhpi.jpg[/img] Also go to the Dungeon east from draynor bank and kill hill giants for dragon items and bones which people buy for prayer.
[b][i]Fishing South of Edgeville[/i][/b] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/o8s3ed.jpg[/img]
[b]How to Level[/b]
To start kill Men or Monks in Edgeville village north and east from bank or walk to wizards tower south from draynor and kill wizards or go to the dungeon east from draynor and kill Zombies and hill giants all at various levels. Ill soon add many many more Monsters and Humans to kill
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/28cld8h.jpg[/img]
[b]How to go Barrows[/b]
Well Zibez barrows is a real attention seeker to players of Zibez as they just love it and gaining great items basically to get to barrows just teleport falador and go the gardens and talk to Weird Old Man.
[b][Pictures][/b]
[b][i]crafting[/i][/b] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/34s45cm.jpg[/img]
[b][i]Shops[/i][/b] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/j9239h.jpg[/img]
[b][i]Herblore[/i][/b] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/dym0cj.jpg[/img]
[b]Chop Logs all over the world of Zibez[/b] [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2yluyh0.jpg[/img]
Thankyou BY Zibez

item.title: Zibez Online Adventure v2
item.dc:creator: @shardyboy shardyboy
item.description:
@shardyboy wrote:

Welcome to Zibez The Massive Multi-Player Online adventure game by Creator Zibez.
Zibez Is a 3D online campatible 317 server coded to the limit with up to 15 quests.
I Created Zibez in Edgeville Village as i thought its just a great partin fun and its a nice little area for a RSPS.

Thanks guys more votes = more players and fun!

Thanks guys more support = more players and fun!

How to make money

Walk east from Edge bank and start thieving on stalls to gain decent cash.
Or you can talk to rommik and start crafting and making amulets.
Also train herblore by talking to siegfried and sell youre pots and stuff,also woodcut all over Zibez and sell your logs either to general or players.

Siegfried Herblore shop

Also go to the Dungeon east from draynor bank and kill hill giants for dragon items and bones which people buy for prayer.

Fishing South of Edgeville

How to Level

To start kill Men or Monks in Edgeville village north and east from bank or walk to wizards tower south from draynor and kill wizards or go to the dungeon east from draynor and kill Zombies and hill giants all at various levels.
Ill soon add many many more Monsters and Humans to kill

How to go Barrows

Well Zibez barrows is a real attention seeker to players of Zibez as they just love it and gaining great items basically to get to barrows just teleport falador and go the gardens and talk to Weird Old Man.

[Pictures]

crafting

Shops

Herblore

Chop Logs all over the world of Zibez

Thankyou BY Zibez
